import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());

		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();

				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}

						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

import java.net.ServerSocket;

				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

	private File file;

		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;

				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}

import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

					}
				}

						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}

					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

	private DataOutputStream outStream;

		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

		this.file = f;

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());

		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

					}

					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();

				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

					}

					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}

					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	public void run() {

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

import java.net.ServerSocket;

	private File file;

	private Socket socket;

	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());

				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

				e.printStackTrace();

		}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

	private File file;

	private Socket socket;

	private DataOutputStream outStream;

		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

			}
		}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;
				for (int j = 0; j < RFCs.length; j++) {
					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

				if (matchedFilePath != null) {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 200 OK\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS + "\r\n"
							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class P2PServer implements Runnable {
	private File file;
	private ServerSocket serverSocket;
	private Socket socket;
	private DataInputStream inStream;
	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	@Override
	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");
		String timeStamp = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss").format(new Date());
		String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
		while (true) {
			try {
				socket = serverSocket.accept();
				inStream = new DataInputStream(socket.getInputStream());
				outStream = new DataOutputStream(socket.getOutputStream());
				String getRequest = inStream.readUTF();
				String[] getRequestParsed = getRequest.split("\r\n");
				String[] getRequestFirstLine = getRequestParsed[0].split(" ");
				String[] getRequestHostName = getRequestParsed[1].split(":");

				String RFCNumber = getRequestFirstLine[1].trim();
				String HostName = getRequestHostName[1].trim();

				File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
				String[] RFCs = new String[fileArray.length];
				for (int i = 0; i < RFCs.length; i++) {
					RFCs[i] = fileArray[i].getName();
				}
				String matchedFilePath = null;

					String[] fileRFCNumber = RFCs[j].split("_");
					if (fileRFCNumber[0].trim().equals(RFCNumber)) {
						matchedFilePath = RFCs[j];
					}
				}

				String absolutePath = file.getAbsolutePath();
				String matchedPath = absolutePath + "\\" + matchedFilePath;
				File responseFile = new File(matchedPath);

							+ "Last-Modified: " + responseFile.lastModified() + "\r\n" + "Content-Length: "
							+ responseFile.length() + "\r\n" + "Content-Type: text/text" + "\r\n";
					Scanner scan = new Scanner(responseFile);
					while (scan.hasNextLine()) {
						String currentLine = scan.nextLine();
						response += currentLine;
					}
				} else {
					String response = "P2P-CI/1.0 404 Not Found\r\n" + "Date: " + timeStamp + "\r\n" + "OS: " + OS
							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

}

import java.io.DataOutputStream;

import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;

	private File file;

	private Socket socket;

	private DataOutputStream outStream;

	public P2PServer(File f, ServerSocket serversocket) {
		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;
	}

	public void run() {
		// DateTimeFormatter timestamp =
		// DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("RFC_1123_DATE_TIME");

							+ "\r\n";
					outStream.writeUTF(response);
				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

	private Socket socket;

	private DataOutputStream outStream;

		this.file = f;
		this.serverSocket = serversocket;

				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

				}

			} catch (IOException e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}

				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
